import StyleSheet from "react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";
var car_style = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    backgroundColor: '#f3f9fc',
    width: '100vw',
    height: '100vh',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center'
  },
  title: {
    margin: '20px',
    padding: '5px',
    fontSize: '16px',

  },

    backgroundColor: '#f3f9fc',
    margin: '10px',
    padding: '40px',
    width: '100%',
    flex: 1,
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    borderRadius: 10
  },
  input_container: {
    marginTop: 20,
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    borderRadius: '7px',
    flex: 1
  },
  input: {
    margin: 10,
    padding: 5,
    fontFamily: 'Tahoma',
    backgroundColor: 'white',
    color: 'black',
    border: '1px solid #ff6961',

  },
  input_text: {
    marginLeft: '12px',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',

    fontWeight: '600'
  },
  button_container: {
    width: '100%',
    margin: '5px',
    padding: '5px',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center'
  },
  row_button_container: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: "center"
  },
  button: {
    margin: '5px',

    backgroundColor: '#ff6961',
    justifyContent: 'center'
  },
  message: {
    margin: '10px',
    padding: '5px',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',

  },

    color: 'red',

    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',

  },
  message_success: {
    color: 'green',

  },

  },
  datePicker: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: 10,
    fontFamily: 'Tahoma',
    backgroundColor: 'white',
    color: 'black',
    borderWidth: 1,
    borderColor: '#ff6961',
    borderRadius: 5
  }
});
export { car_style };
